highlights: Developed a security-focused URL analysis platform using Ruby on Rails and PostgreSQL to perform real-time word frequency, tokenization, and content statistics via web UI and RESTful APIs.
Implemented robust input validation, type checking, and sanitization with Rails strong parameters and regex-based tokenization to mitigate injection and malware-related risks.
Integrated statistical analysis workflows using the WordsCounted library to compute top-word frequencies, token counts, and character metrics for submitted URL content.
Designed responsive and performant user interactions with Turbo Rails, Stimulus, Bootstrap, and Redis-backed infrastructure to support fast updates and scalable request handling.
